channel.title: [NVM] How do I check if a Variable/Const has something in it?
channel.description:
Never mind, I got my answer after 40 minutes of testing lol.
How do I check if a Variable/Const has something in it?
I asked a few people and they said if you do this... If (effect) then Begin // whatever here End;
My const effect has nothing in it. I want it to check if it has anything in it. I get a type mismatch. And it can have anything in there because it will be user defined so it's not a boolean.
But that didn't work. Is there a already made function or procedure or do I have to make one myself? :(
Thanks for the help.

item.title: [NVM] How do I check if a Variable/Const has something in it?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Never mind, I got my answer after 40 minutes of testing lol.

How do I check if a Variable/Const has something in it?

I asked a few people and they said if you do this…
If (effect) then
Begin
// whatever here
End;

My const effect has nothing in it. I want it to check if it has anything in it. I get a type mismatch. And it can have anything in there because it will be user defined so it’s not a boolean.

But that didn’t work. Is there a already made function or procedure or do I have to make one myself?

Thanks for the help.

Read full topic
item.source: [NVM] How do I check if a Variable/Const has something in it?
